snippet.title: Strawberry Jam Ch. 1 trailer - Remar Games
snippet.description:
Download: https://www.remar.se/daniel/strawberry.php

The trailer for chapter 1 of Strawberry Jam, a short but replayable platforming text adventure. The game took about a year to make, but the work was spread out over a period of seven years, during which I mostly made a bunch of other games instead. I don't know if I'll make the remaining chapters at this point, I'm just glad the first one is finally done.

This trailer took about 12 hours to make, most of which was spent modifying a version of the game for recording and fiddling with the timing and sound. It was recorded using Fraps 3.2.2 and edited with ancient versions of VirtualDub and GoldWave.

There were forward references to this game in Iji (in a secret terminal) and Hyper Princess Pitch (when viewing the highscore screen with a blank save file). This first chapter, "The Machine Fortress", is based on a children's story I wrote in school many years ago.
